name: Lithium's Movie Score PWAD
description: I'm bored tonight so I thought I'd make myself a music PWAD and share it with the Internet community. :) This wad contains 9 .MIDs of songs from famous movies. I just threw this together to have something to listen to during modoom so if it doesn't fit your tastes, don't download it. :) This sounds fine on my GUS but I have no idea how it sounds on other cards.
